courseSectionInformation: Prerequisite: Credit or concurrent registration in ACCY 501 or equivalent; enrollment in graduate degree program or consent of department.
description: Introduction to management accounting as part of the firm's information system, in terms of modern cost accounting and budgetary systems for planning and controlling business operations. Prerequisite: Credit or concurrent registration in ACCY 501 or equivalent; enrollment in graduate degree program or consent of department.
label: Managerial Accounting
sectionRegistrationNotes: Restricted to MBA: (PT) Business Adm -- UIUC.
